divs: Sighting Detailstwo objects 1 - at about 30 degrees above the horizon due south of our location and the 2 - at about 30 degrees above the horizon south south west of our location. Both were stationary for more than 5 minutes and then both ascended about another 5 degrees on station as to previous location At all times during observation they appeared to pulse the colors, which caused me to get binoculars to attempt to identify the source. I then realized that they were apparently stationary until one moved to my right and upward, looking to the other I realizes that it too had moved. Both were very star like save for the pulsing of colors.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Terry
There were no other sightings in Terry on or around July 6th 2010
